Key Match Events: The Thunder went on a 9-2 run with Gilgeous-Alexander on the bench to regain control of the game.
The Thunder led 103-87 when Gilgeous-Alexander returned.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Victor Wembanyama was held to six points on 1-for-5 shooting in his matchup with Holmgren.
Others: The Thunder have won all four of its games by at least 12 points.
The Spurs shot just 41.2% from the field and struggled to manufacture shots for their young star.
